Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial on the Effects of CPB-Induced Shear Stress on Monocyte-Endothelial Interactions

Trial_Design.evidence: In this in vitro randomised controlled trial

Participants.evidence: THP-1 monocyte-like cells and human neonatal dermal microvascular endothelial cells (HNDMVECs) were used

Intervention.evidence: THP-1 cells were exposed to shear stress in polyvinyl chloride tubing at 2.1 Pa for 2 hours

Objective.evidence: This study aims to elucidate the effects of CPB-induced shear stress on monocyte-endothelial interactions

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was IL-8 production and monocyte adhesion, assessed over a 6-hour period

Result_Outcome.evidence: Higher IL-8 levels were found in the sheared THP-1 and HNDMVEC co-culture medium
